Tutorial¶

This is the turorial for the GOFEE structure search.

  • Cu3Au2 with EMT - First search
  • Cu15 with EMT - Detailed
  • Au7 on Cu(111) with EMT
  • Modifying surrogate model
  • Searching for TiO clusters
  • Searching for the TiO2(001)-(1x4) reconstruction

Different types of searches/modifications covered in these tutorials include:

  • Isolated clusters (see here)

  • Constraining the positions of the free atoms during the search (see here)

  • Surface reconstruction (see here)

  • Modifying the surrogate model (see here)
